description: The CAC Sabre Mk.31 is a day fighter and fighter-bomber derived from the F-86F Sabre. It is also known as the Avon Sabre. The Mk.31 a development of the Mk.30 and has the original slatted wing replaced by the unslatted 6-3 wing, but retains the Rolls-Royce Avon 20 engine. The original variant described here lacks IRMs, and has only two weapon stations.
